channel.title: Comments on: For Auld Lang Syne
channel.description: Supporting children's language, communication and learning

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Hi Maria! That's fascinating. I understand that there was a lot of 'Scandinavian' influence on the Scots language and accent. The culture in northern Scotland (Orkney and Shetland) remains closely linked to ancient 'Viking' culture. I hope you have a 'cup of kindness' (or two!) at Hogmanay!! Thank you for replying Best wishes Michael
item.content:encoded:
Hi Maria! That’s fascinating. I understand that there was a lot of ‘Scandinavian’ influence on the Scots language and accent. The culture in northern Scotland (Orkney and Shetland) remains closely linked to ancient ‘Viking’ culture.
I hope you have a ‘cup of kindness’ (or two!) at Hogmanay!!
Thank you for replying
Best wishes
Michael

item.title: By: Maria Holm
item.dc:creator: Maria Holm
item.description: In Danish "long ago" is still "længe siden" and is pronounced nearly as in the old song.
item.content:encoded: In Danish “long ago” is still “længe siden” and is pronounced nearly as in the old song.

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: And you too Janine! Keep up the great work you are doing over there in Cambodia! Very best wishes Michael
item.content:encoded:
And you too Janine! Keep up the great work you are doing over there in Cambodia!
Very best wishes
Michael

item.title: By: Janine
item.dc:creator: Janine
item.description:
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you and your family.
Cheers,Janine
item.content:encoded:
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you and your family.

Cheers,Janine

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: Oh No!!!! Can't I be like champagne or chocolate??? I wouldn't be where I am now without you Sue!!!! Keep wearing THAT dress!!! Michael xxx
item.content:encoded:
Oh No!!!! Can’t I be like champagne or chocolate??? I wouldn’t be where I am now without you Sue!!!! Keep wearing THAT dress!!!
Michael xxx

item.title: By: Sue
item.dc:creator: Sue
item.description: Happy New Year to you too Michael! You've kept us all chuckling and reminiscing and thinking about things (in the way only you can!) over the past year and I just wanted to say thank you. Take care, you're my favourite Marmite!
item.content:encoded:
Happy New Year to you too Michael!
You’ve kept us all chuckling and reminiscing and thinking about things (in the way only you can!) over the past year and I just wanted to say thank you.
Take care, you’re my favourite Marmite!
